CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 18, reads: "3. Capehart TV salesman, P. Corretti, of Campbell General Tire and Hawkinson Treads, Inc., demonstrates a tape recorder for Mrs. Calvin Jeter.
TitMainTitle: P. Corretti showing tape recorder to Mrs. Calvin Jeter in Capehart Radios, Hawkinson Treads, Inc., and Campbell General Tire Company booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Televisions--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
